data-v-8f1e4a82="">选择</span>我们 </div><div data-v-8f1e4a82="" class="sub_text">OPPO 与时代同频发展，我们秉持本分基因，坚持互利共赢，助力你登上价值发挥的舞台</div><div data-v-8f1e4a82="" class="left-inner"></div></div><ul data-v-8f1e4a82="" class="ent-img__list"><li data-v-8f1e4a82="" class="ent-img__item co-hover ent-img__item1"><div data-v-8f1e4a82="" class="text"><h1 data-v-8f1e4a82=""><div data-v-8f1e4a82="">前程广阔</div></h1><p data-v-8f1e4a82=""> 在万物互融时代下，坚持以“用户”为中心，持续打造伟大产品，凭借软件、硬件、互联网服务的基础能力，为用户打造无缝衔接的智慧生活体验 </p></div><img data-v-8f1e4a82="" src="/assets/1-42202235.png" alt=""></li><li data-v-8f1e4a82="" class="ent-img__item co-hover ent-img__item2"><div data-v-8f1e4a82="" class="text"><h1 data-v-8f1e4a82=""><div data-v-8f1e4a82="">科技创新</div></h1><p data-v-8f1e4a82=""> 我们秉持长期主义的科技创新与持续投入，已构建“工程技术组织 + 先行研究组织+基础技术组织”三位一体的研发体系，培育创新沃土，建立了全球六大研究所，六大研发中心 </p></div></li><li data-v-8f1e4a82="" class="ent-img__item ent-img__item3"><div data-v-8f1e4a82="" class="top co-hover"><div data-v-8f1e4a82="" class="text"><h1 data-v-8f1e4a82=""><div data-v-8f1e4a82="">互利共赢</div></h1><p data-v-8f1e4a82=""> 我们秉持与员工利益共享原则，同时提倡简单纯粹的工作氛围与开放合作的工作态度，在这里你将与良师益友并肩微笑前行 </p></div></div><div data-v-8f1e4a82="" class="bot co-hover ent-img__item3_1"><div data-v-8f1e4a82="" class="text"><h1 data-v-8f1e4a82=""><div data-v-8f1e4a82="">本分基因</div></h1><p data-v-8f1e4a82="">本分是做正确的事，批判性思考，求责于己，不赚人便宜，本分高于诚信</p></div><img data-v-8f1e4a82="" src="/assets/4-998b3b93.png" alt=""></div></li><li data-v-8f1e4a82="" class="ent-img__item ent-img__item4 co-hover"><div data-v-8f1e4a82="" class="text"><h1 data-v-8f1e4a82=""><div data-v-8f1e4a82="">尊重专业</div></h1><p data-v-8f1e4a82="">我们充分尊重专业与技术，扁平化的汇报层级、开放包容的氛围，将助力你的个人价值得以发挥和实现</p></div></li></ul></div></div><!----><div data-v-44dc9a42="" data-v-ad014148="" class="co-action co-se-bot"><div data-v-ad014148="" class="cont-wrap introduce-cont"><div data-v-ad014148="" class="left-inner"></div><div data-v-ad014148="" class="left"><h1 data-v-ad014148="" class="sub_title"><img data-v-ad014148="" src="/assets/title_4-40574442.png" class="title_fix" width="86">我们是谁</h1><p data-v-ad014148="" class="sub_text">OPPO 致力成为以打造伟大产品为基石的科技公司，为全球用户提供更好的移动智慧生活。</p></div><div data-v-ad014148="" van-ellipsis">Brand planning</div></div><div class="job-item__img"><span class="fut_left"><img src="data:image/png;base64," alt="" srcset=""></span><span class="fut_right"><img class="cont-wrap"><div class="sub_title"><img src="/assets/title_3-8f20f4ab.png" class="title_fix" width="86">绽放<span>精彩</span>人生 </div><span class="more"><span>更多故事</span><svg viewBox="0 0 1024 1024" width="1.2em" height="1.2em" name="arrow-right1" size="20" class="icon-more"><path fill="currentColor" d="M754.752 480H160a32 32 0 1 0 0 64h594.752L521.344 777.344a32 32 0 0 0 45.312 45.312l288-288a32 32 0 0 0 0-45.312l-288-288a32 32 0 1 0-45.312 45.312L754.752 480z"></path></svg></span></div></div><div class="story-list"><div class="cont-wrap"><!----><div data-v-44dc9a42="" class="co-action d-ac"><div class="swiper swiper-initialized swiper-horizontal swiper-pointer-events story-list__wrap swiper-backface-hidden" arrow="hover"><div class="swiper-wrapper" style="transform: translate3d(0px, 0px, 0px);"><div class="swiper-slide swiper-slide-active story-list__item co-hover" style="width: 308.5px; margin-right: 16px;"><div class="list-img"><img src="https://ocs-cn-south1.heytapcs.com/dhr-social-recruit/4267ab2e37b34793b838909050071ed9?response-content-disposition=attachment%3Bfilename%2A%3DUTF-8%27%27%25E4%25BD%258D%25E5%259B%25BE1.jpg&amp;AWSAccessKeyId=6ffU2ecFNrcorLlh5lL5BnvQQEOJth5VdrQsAy10&amp;Expires=2145888000&amp;Signature=f6vn7JDQHIxdJ447R6%2F6i7ZZYgA%3D" alt=""></div><div class="text"><h3 class="desc">研究院高级新技术产品经理</h3><h1 class="title mid">成晟：我也曾迷茫，但人总在瞬间就成长</h1><p class="info">成晟希望做出能够影响未来生活的产品，比如机器人。她与 OPPO 研究院最有创造力的团队一起合作，对机器人的研发已经进入了2.0阶段，产品和技术也在不断演进。</p><div class="bot"></div></div></div><div class="swiper-slide swiper-slide-next story-list__item co-hover" style="width: 308.5px; margin-right: 16px;"><div class="list-img"><img src="https://ocs-cn-south1.heytapcs.com/dhr-social-recruit/1535d3c85abe410cb9f584dc1978fab0?response-content-disposition=attachment%3Bfilename%2A%3DUTF-8%27%27%25E4%25BD%258D%25E5%259B%25BE2.jpg&amp;AWSAccessKeyId=6ffU2ecFNrcorLlh5lL5BnvQQEOJth5VdrQsAy10&amp;Expires=2145888000&amp;Signature=J%2Fpqe17jippZ%2FzdOQyO1lT0e7P4%3D" alt=""></div><div class="text"><h3 class="desc">罗马尼亚代理商零售业务负责人</h3><h1 class="title mid">Dan Amariei：疫情很困难，但我跟OPPO挺了过来</h1><p class="info">Dan Amariei 相信自己，相信团队，通过多种努力把疫情对初入罗马尼亚市场的 OPPO 的冲击降到最小。疫情的考验和磨合也让 Dan 和 OPPO 罗马尼亚团队更加懂得本分与坚持。</p><div class="bot"></div></div></div><div class="swiper-slide story-list__item co-hover" style="width: 308.5px; margin-right: 16px;"><div class="list-img"><img src="https://ocs-cn-south1.heytapcs.com/dhr-social-recruit/6792dac8f67345f1aa005b166fcde579?response-content-disposition=attachment%3Bfilename%2A%3DUTF-8%27%27%25E4%25BD%258D%25E5%259B%25BE3.jpg&amp;AWSAccessKeyId=6ffU2ecFNrcorLlh5lL5BnvQQEOJth5VdrQsAy10&amp;Expires=2145888000&amp;Signature=5CIxSLH1Uuc32WjKvKf1RDV6ZPc%3D" alt=""></div><div class="text"><h3 class="desc">高级音效设计师</h3><h1 class="title mid">李鸿：用声音治愈6亿人</h1><p class="info">李鸿希望以声音设计师的身份构建声音与其他科技的联系，让更多人了解声音的美好，拓宽声音的“频率”。2022年，O Relax 城市之声一举斩获红点优胜设计奖。</p><div class="bot"></div></div></div><div class="swiper-slide story-list__item co-hover" style="width: 308.5px; margin-right: 16px;"><div class="list-img"><img src="https://ocs-cn-south1.heytapcs.com/dhr-social-recruit/1116d53326bd42e1aab5d2f7acaa49e5?response-content-disposition=attachment%3Bfilename%2A%3DUTF-8%27%27%25E4%25BD%258D%25E5%259B%25BE4-2.png&amp;AWSAccessKeyId=6ffU2ecFNrcorLlh5lL5BnvQQEOJth5VdrQsAy10&amp;Expires=2145888000&amp;Signature=8qnp2hB5gmk3%2Fi0wfZx%2Bkfn82nM%3D" alt=""></div><div class="text"><h3 class="desc">印度研发中心首席影像工程师</h3><h1 class="title mid">Saritha Bandaru：影像算法能有多精细</h1><p class="info">Saritha 带领团队优化算法，确保在使用OPPO手机拍照时既能让女孩子漂亮，又能还原清晰的Bindi，在保护印度文化 Bindi 的同时，展示出印度女性独特的力量，让拍照也变得更人性化、更本土化。</p><div class="bot"></div></div></div></div><!----><!----><!----></div></div></div></div></div><div class="joinUs-wrap"><div class="join-title b">我们期待你是</div><div class="join-us-swiper"><div class="swiper swiper-initialized swiper-horizontal swiper-pointer-events join-us-list__wrap" arrow="hover"><div class="swiper-wrapper" style="transition-duration: 0ms;
